channel.title: What the hell?!?!
channel.description:
Okay so I went through fixing some stuff & now I cant run my server? Like really I have no fucking clue how this could of happen.
[IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/2edc9kk.jpg[/img]
Any help please!

item.title: What the hell?!?!
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”][quote author=zyle1992 link=topic=483405.msg3541188#msg3541188 date=1300874333]
You have a space/tab somewhere where it shouldn’t be in items.cfg.
[/quote]Wouldn’t that throw an InvalidNumberFormatException?[/quote]

If it were trying to parse a number like 1234a56789. But with the old winterlove server’s, it uses a StringTokenizer over and over again, and then stores the parsed values in different arrays. Like

itemNames[id] = Integer.parseInt(parsedArgs[0]);
itemDescriptions[id] = Integer.parseInt(parsedArgs[1]);

So I’m guessing one of the item lines in items.cfg wasn’t formatted correctly.

Read full topic

@zoomer wrote:

Already fixed this thanks anyways guys.
